pageProps.title: Git 개행문자(crlf, lf) 설정
pageProps.description:
OS별 Line Break
windows : CRLF / CR(Carriage-Return, \r) + LF(Line Feed, \n)
unix, mac : LF(Line Feed, \n)

 Line Break 설정 (core.eol)
- core.eol = nat
